caption: Decrypt Message
doc: Decrypt a read message using an OpenPGP RSA 4096 private key. If a public key is present verifies the signature.

ABo.caption: date
ABo.doc: Use the supplied date as the signature verification date, instead of current date.
ABo.name: date

ABy.caption: This action is an endpoint providing data in the element state.
ABy.name: hint
